titles.title: Fluorescent Lightbulb Implementation Program to Save Americans Value and Energy
A bill to direct the Secretary of Energy to provide grants to States for the distribution of compact fluorescent lights.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S7337)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
6/7/2007--Introduced.
Fluorescent Lightbulb Implementation Program to Save Americans Value and Energy - Instructs the Secretary of Energy to establish a program of grants to states for distribution of medium base compact fluorescent lamps to households. Requires a recipient state to give distribution priority to low-income households.
